articles.author: BARBARA ORTUTAY
articles.description: Kai Koerber was a junior at Marjory Stoneman Douglas High School when a gunman murdered 14 students and three staff members there on Valentine’s Day in 2018. Seeing his peers — and himself — struggle with returning to normal, he wanted to do something to help people manage their emotions on their own terms.
articles.title: Parkland school shooting survivor develops Joy, an app built on AI that helps people heal

articles.author: STEPHEN GROVES, LISA MASCARO and FARNOUSH AMIRI
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Staring down a fast-approaching government shutdown that threatens to disrupt life for millions of Americans, Speaker Kevin McCarthy has turned to a strategy that so far has preserved his tenuous hold on House leadership but also marked it by chaos: giving hard-right lawmakers what they want.
articles.title: Speaker McCarthy gives in to hard-line conservatives in hopes of solving government funding impasse

articles.author: AAMER MADHANI
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — This probably wasn't how President Joe Biden envisioned his big foreign policy week ending.Biden spent much of the time trying to make the case to world leaders at the U.N.
articles.title: Biden faces foreign policy trouble spots as he aims to highlight his experience on the global stage

articles.author: BRIAN WITTE
articles.description: ANNAPOLIS, Md. (AP) — Residents in parts of coastal North Carolina and Virginia experienced flooding Saturday after Tropical Storm Ophelia made landfall near a North Carolina barrier island, bringing rain, damaging winds and dangerous surges.
articles.title: Coastal North Carolina hit by flooding as Tropical Storm Ophelia moves inland

articles.author: JUAN A. LOZANO
articles.description: HOUSTON (AP) — The family of a Black high school student in Texas who was suspended over his dreadlocks filed a federal civil rights lawsuit Saturday against the state's governor and attorney general, alleging they failed to enforce a new law outlawing discrimination based on hairstyles.
articles.title: A Black student was suspended for his hairstyle. Now his family is suing Texas officials

articles.author: DAVID KOENIG
articles.description: Even after escalating its strike against Detroit automakers on Friday, the United Auto Workers union still has plenty of leverage in its effort to force the companies to agree to significant increases in pay and benefits.
articles.title: Auto workers still have room to expand their strike against car makers. But they also face risks

articles.author: JAKE OFFENHARTZ
articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — In late 2020, Sen. Bob Menendez met with Philip Sellinger, a private practice lawyer and former fundraiser for the senator, to assess his potential fit as the next U.S. attorney for the state of New Jersey — and to discuss one case in particular.
articles.title: Bribery case against Sen. Menendez shines light on powerful NJ developer accused of corruption

articles.author: MICHAEL CASEY
articles.description: NASHVILLE, Tenn. (AP) — For months, Carlton Clemons endured crippling pain from a rotting wisdom tooth. He couldn’t sleep, barely ate and relied on painkillers to get by.The 67-year-old from Nashville, Tennessee, could not afford to see a dentist on the $1,300-a-month his family gets in Social Security and disability payments.
articles.title: Many states are expanding their Medicaid programs to provide dental care to their poorest residents

articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — President Joe Biden has gotten the updated COVID-19 vaccine and annual flu shot, the White House said Saturday.
articles.title: Biden has gotten the updated COVID-19 vaccine and the annual flu shot, the White House says

articles.author: SUSIE BLANN
articles.description: KYIV, Ukraine (AP) — Ukraine on Saturday morning launched another missile attack on Sevastopol on the occupied Crimean Peninsula, a Russian-installed official said, a day after an attack on the headquarters of Russia’s Black Sea Fleet that left a serviceman missing and the main building smoldering.
articles.title: Ukraine targets a key Crimean city a day after striking Russia's Black Sea Fleet headquarters
